text:
Thunder Token Inc/Dev Ops/Full Time/Sunnyvale, CA

Responsibilities: Maintain a large number of infrastructure nodes running regions around the world. Respond to issues at ALL times (24/7) after network launch. Eth node syncing to main net. Perform evaluation on network

Preferred Qualities: Team player and hardworking Are passionate about Crypto

Please email your CV and job title directly to hr@thundertoken.com for considerations
